Type the O key by reaching your ring finger up. Try not to laugh during this screen!
1: f bbb f bbb f bbb f bbb f bbb f bbb ||fbb fbb fbb fbb fbb fbb fbb fbb fbb ||bbf bbf bbf bbf bbf bbf bbf bbf bbf
Type the B key with your left hand's index finger. It's a bit of a stretch!

We are now moving to your final finger, the pinky! Type the A key with your left hand's pinky finger. Remember to leave all your other fingers resting on the Home Row at all times.
